adv: Allows very quickly to look at relationships between variables and easily understand how they relate to each other
disadv: Lack of use of color (hue?) with size in some visuals might be hindering the ability to quickly grasp the numbers
comment: I think this a great tool to understand relationships between multiple variables and would love to see more data viz tools out there be able to implement something like this. The ability to sort, filter, and resize variables would also be nice additional features to include.
